short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates a cheat sheet from bachbracket.com!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Used to create a helpful cheat sheet from within the bachbracket website. The cheat sheet will allow you to take notes while watching the bachelor and plan your next week's picks. If you have already selected contestants for the given week, they will be bolded on your generated cheat sheet. 

To generate a cheat sheet, navigate to the "My Picks" page, a new button is added called "Create Cheat Sheet". Pressing the button will generate a new tab with a formatted list of contestants that is easily printable on letter paper.

Print the cheat sheet, take notes while you watch, and dominate the bracket!
